root.name: Great Baseball
root.description: OverviewGreat Baseball is the second game released in Sega's series of Great Sports games, and like the original Great Soccer was released on card format rather than the system's later-standard cartridge. It was also one of two Great Sports games to never be released outside of Japan - the other being the first Great Golf game.The Great Baseball known in the west is actually this game's sequel, called The Pro Yakyuu: Pennant Race in Japan.
